definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[אָפָוּנׇה]] Ps 88:16 (a(/p. leg Dl:Pr 135 f. comp. As. appuna (ma) adv =; maê dišvery, very much, but dub.; Thes MV form fr. √ [[פון]] & comp. Ar 0’afana diminuit, mente diminuit (Frey.), hence be confused, helpless, cf. LXX e)chpqrh/qhn Vulgate contur-batus sum; others emend [[אָפוּגׇה]] fr. [[פּטּג]] q.v. A vb. however is not needed for parallelism).
